page.title: 10EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content:
FIRE:With 40 calls a year within a radius of 35 miles(averaging 10 miles) it is not a busy station. The eleven members of the Brigade are contacted by pocket alerters at their place of work. The first few to arrive become the crew for the emergency.
AMBULANCE:There are 1000 calls each year but few serious accidents.On duty each of the three men does 24 hours per day for 7 days with every second weekend off. The area covered is as far west as Rannoch Station and,if needed,to Argyllshire.
